message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $250. It's a great deal, and I think you'll be thrilled with your purchase.
I'm really interested in the product, but $250 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $180. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

Hi Bob, I understand that $250 might be a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do $220, which is a great compromise. It's still a fantastic deal, and I think you'll really love the product.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $220 is still a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $190. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

Hi Bob, I understand that $190 is still a bit above your budget. I'm willing to make another concession. I can do $200, which is my lowest price for this product. I think it's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but $200 is still a bit too high for me. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to be careful with my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $180. Can you consider this price?
